definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Population density in arid areas is too high and damages the land further.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱地區的人口密度太高，這會進一步破壞土地。

sentences.english: And it is not only the number, but also the intensity.
sentences.chinese: 這僅是指人口的，還包括人口密度。

sentences.english: Right now, the average density of population on Earth is 25/km2.
sentences.chinese: 現在，地球上的人口密度是每平方公里二十五人。

sentences.english: In areas of high density it looks more or less like population density.
sentences.chinese: 在高密度區域，它或多或少地看起來像是人口密度。

sentences.english: The increasing population density will even further congeal traffic.
sentences.chinese: 日益增加的人口密度將使交通更加癱瘓。

sentences.english: It has a standard of living that is very high, and yet its average population density is 400/km2.
sentences.chinese: 其人口密度每平方公里400人，但生活水平卻很高。

sentences.english: It is the second-smallest of the former Soviet republics and the most densely populated.
sentences.chinese: 它是前蘇聯第二小的，但人口密度最高的共和國。

sentences.english: Monaco has the distinction of being the most densely-populated country in the world.
sentences.chinese: 摩納哥是世界上人口密度最高的國家。

sentences.english: They found that brain size decreased as population density increased.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現，大腦的尺寸隨着人口密度的增長而減小。

sentences.english: It also cites the country's high population density as a reason for these strict measures.
sentences.chinese: 它還援引該國人口密度高爲採取嚴格的措施的理由。

sentences.english: Samut Prakan is an industrial city and very densely populated.
sentences.chinese: 北欖是一個工業城市，人口密度很大。

sentences.english: Overall population density is about 140 per sq. mi.
sentences.chinese: 人口密度大約每平方公里140人。

sentences.english: The population density of that country is 685 per square mile.
sentences.chinese: 那個國家的人口密度爲每平方英里685人。

sentences.english: Tenasserim had a very sparse population .
sentences.chinese: 丹那沙林人口密度不大。

definition: urbanization level (of a city or town)
size (i.e. area) of a country, geographical region or school campus etc/(fig.) scope/extent
